plugin.name: Aardwolf_Stats_Grabber
plugin.author: Jyscal
plugin.description: Track levels, Gold, Trains and Pups gained during a session. Sessions can be started and stopped at any time and then exported to upload to AardStats Website

trigger.match: ^You raise a level! You are now level (.+).$
^You gain (.+) hit points, (.+) mana, (.+) moves, (.+) practices, (.+) trains and (.+) instinct trains.$
^Lucky! You gain an extra (.+) training sessions!$
^You are taxed (.+) gold coins by your clan.$

muclient.script:
require "gmcphelper"
local totalLevels = 0 local totalGold = 0 local totalTrains = 0 local totalPups = 0 local isTracking = false
function tallyLevels(name, line, wildcards) playerLevel = gmcpval("status.level") if playerLevel == '200' or '201' then return end if isTracking == true then totalLevels = totalLevels + 1 end end
function tallyGold(name, line, wildcards) levelGold = wildcards[1] if isTracking == true then totalGold = totalGold + tonumber(levelGold) end end
function showStats(name, line, wildcards)
end
function tallyTrains(name, line, wildcards) levelTrains = wildcards[5] if isTracking == true then totalTrains = totalTrains + tonumber(levelTrains) end end
function tallyPups(name, line, wildcards) levelPups = wildcards[1] if isTracking == true then totalPups = totalPups + tonumber(levelPups) end end
function tallyLucky(name, line, wildcards) luckyTrains = wildcards[1] if isTracking == true then totalTrains = totalTrains + tonumber(luckyTrains) end end
function removeTax(name, line, wildcards) if isTracking == true then totalGold = totalGold - wildcards[1] end end
function startTracking(name, line, wildcards) isTracking = true end
function stopTracking(name, line, wildcards) isTracking = false end
function resetSession(name, line, wildcards) totalLevels = 0 totalGold = 0 totalTrains = 0 totalPups = 0
ColourTell("white", "blue", "Session reset.") end
function exportStats(name, line, wildcards) nowTable = os.date('*t') nowYear = nowTable.year nowMonth = nowTable.month nowDay = nowTable.day exportDate = nowDay.."/"..nowMonth.."/"..nowYear
totalLevels = tostring(totalLevels) totalGold = tostring(totalGold) totalTrains = tostring(totalTrains) totalPups = tostring(totalPups)
file = io.open("C:/Users/cheryl/Desktop/stats_export.txt", "w+") file:write(exportDate..","..totalLevels..","..totalGold..","..totalTrains..","..totalPups) file:close()
ColourTell("white", "blue", "Stats have been exported succesfully.") end
function OnPluginInstall()
end
function OnPluginEnable()
end
function OnPluginDisable()
end
function OnPluginSaveState()
end
